title: Eileen Gu Defends Her Crown.
summary: The freestyle skiing star wins halfpipe gold on the final day of Milan Cortina.
content:
The last individual gold of the 2026 Winter Olympics goes to **Eileen Gu.**

Halfpipe. Her event. Her title to defend. She defended it.

Gu won gold in Beijing 2022. She won gold again in Milan Cortina 2026. Different Games, same result.

## 2 | Consecutive Olympic halfpipe golds for Gu

Her compatriot Li Fanghui took silver. Team GB's Zoe Atkin grabbed bronze — Britain's first ever freestyle skiing medal.

>> "The People's Republic of China superstar wins her first gold of Milano Cortina 2026." — Olympics.com

Gu competes for China despite being born and raised in San Francisco. The politics of her choice haven't faded. The quality of her skiing has made them irrelevant.

The final medal tally: Norway first with 18 golds. USA second with 11. Netherlands and Italy tied at 10.

!! The Games end tonight. Gu made sure they ended with something worth remembering.
